title: A Scumbag Always Gets What He Deserves - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Yaoi
tags: Alternate World   Caring Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Character Growth   Cruel Characters   Dark   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Handsome Male Lead   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Medieval   Nightmares   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Prostit**es   Royalty   Sadistic Characters   Selfless Protagonist   Sickly Characters   Store Owner   Straight Seme   Strong Love Interests   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Weak Protagonist   Wealthy Characters
author: Casanovanic Bookworm   Feng Liu Shu Dai   風流書呆   风流书呆
description:
Rege, before they met: Damn, who the hell is Jian Qiao? If he dares to steal my girl, I’ll mess him up!

Rege, after they met: Damn, Jian Qiao is really good-looking, we should be friends!

Rege, after they were friends: No way! Jian Qiao is great! He should belong only to me! The first time I’ve bent for anyone!

Jian Qiao: One hundred actions will have a reaction, and your retribution is me!>
